tool_description: Formats analytics results into dashboard-compatible data structures with appropriate aggregations, time series, and visualization-ready formats.

input_data_sources.description: List of analytics result identifiers to format for dashboard

dashboard_type.description: Type of dashboard: operational, strategic, analytical

time_aggregation.description: Time-based aggregation level: hourly, daily, weekly, monthly

max_categories.description: Maximum number of categories to display in categorical data

error_messages: Empty data sources: input_data_sources array cannot be empty
Invalid dashboard type: Use one of [operational, strategic, analytical]
Invalid time aggregation: Use one of [hourly, daily, weekly, monthly]
Invalid category limit: max_categories must be between 5 and 50
Data formatting error: Unable to format one or more data sources for dashboard display
usage: Provide analytics data sources and specify dashboard type and formatting parameters. Returns structured data ready for dashboard visualization.

formatted_datasets.description: List of formatted dataset identifiers ready for visualization

chart_configurations.description: Recommended chart types and configurations for each dataset

update_frequency.description: Recommended update frequency for dashboard refresh

data_quality_score.description: Overall data quality score for dashboard reliability
